name: FADING (itch) (NightinGames)
description:
Memories of the Past.  About

Fading is a small First Person Walking Simulator taking place in a single room. You are supposed to explore the room to find five hidden objects.

Features 
  • Explore a lovingly designed teenage room
  • Learn about the story
  • Find 5 story objects
  • Discover 5 hidden achievements
  • Playtime 5 – 10 minutes
Controls

WASD to move
Shift to crouch
Left Mouse Button to interact
Standard Mouse Control to look around
Esc for pause menu

Team

The game was made by three students as part of a university project:

  • Tanja Wiemer (Game- & Level Design)
  • Antonia Schmidt (Art) 
  • Yasmin Burkhardtsmaier (Sound Design & Programming)

You can check out Yasmin on her itch.io page: https://ghost-goat.itch.io/
